input.description: virtual machine Virtual machine name used to make the method call.

resource pool [optional] Target resource pool for the virtual machine. If the pool parameter is left unset, the target pool for virtual machine's migration will be that virtual machine's current pool.

host [optional] Host name of the target host on which the virtual machine will run. The host parameter may be left unset if the compute resource associated with the target pool represents a stand-alone host or a DRS-enabled cluster. In the former case the stand-alone host is used as the target host. In the latter case, each connected host in the cluster that is not in maintenance mode is tested as a target host.

tes type list [optional] The set of tests to run. If this argument is not set, all tests will be run. Value takes the form :
<test-type-list> <test-type></test-type> <test-type></test-type> </test-type-list>
Valid values for test-type:
compatibilityTests diskAccessibilityTests resourceTests sourceTests

state [optional] The power state that the virtual machine must have. If this argument is not set, virtual machine is evaluated according to its current power state.
Valid values: poweredOff, poweredOn, suspended

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <virtual-machine>${virtual machine}</virtual-machine> <state>${state}</state> <test-type-list>${test type list}</test-type-list> <resource-pool>${resource pool}</resource-pool> <host-system>${host}</host-system> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Constructs <items> for Validate VM Migration operation
